post.text: For 30 years -- 30 YEARS -- Hillary Clinton hasn't fixed anything. In fact, her only experience has been at failing. As President, believe me, there will be dramatic change. We are going to get things DONE! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Mason
comment.text: Quote from Hilary at Monday night's debate. My husband did a fantastic job as president in the nineties. Sure if you count bj's under the table of the Oval Office, leaving the next president with a recession and being impeached by the House of Representatives a good job. Who's deplorable?

replies.author: Terra
replies.text: Don't forget what they stole from the White House (us) and that they trashed the whole place, like low-life renters who got evicted. Simply white-trash with money.

replies.author: Shay
replies.text: Wow you trumptetts are going nuts. The white house was not trashed when they left. that was bs put out by W's toadies. they later admitted that they lied about it. Look up stuff before you say somthing. You might want to do before you believe it and spread lies. But then you are a trumpt person, andd we know the truth means nothing .

replies.author: Kaleb
replies.text: Shay you're wrong. And it is just like people like you who want other people to do research for you. It is a simple Google search. Clintons leave White House quarter million dollars stolen in the White House furniture/items. And they had to bring it back. Liberal Democrats base their thoughts on emotions instead of facts. So you can collars every word in the book. We know Facts, you know Emotion. And don't expect people to do your research for you.
